name: Nomad
description: $NOM is a cutting-edge meme coin designed for the modern DeFi investor. Embracing a zero buy tax and a minimal 0.01% sell tax, this token prioritizes accessibility and profitability. Fully decentralized and secured by WAGMI, $NOM supports an innovative tipping feature poised to revolutionize token utility in the crypto space. With 100% of the supply locked in liquidity and a transparent, open-source smart contract, $NOM offers a secure and dynamic investment opportunity. Dive into the future of meme coins with $NOM, where community engagement and rapid growth converge.
